title: Power series for e^(-2x^2) part - a

content.description: Let f be the function given by <math> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </math>.
content.question: Find the first four nonzero terms and the general term of the power series for f (x) about x =0 .

frqParts.text: Find the first four nonzero terms and the general term of the power series for f (x) about x =0 .
